reviewText:
The face looks a little weathery and older, but Roddy Piper, WWF's former world champion, still has a great physique and that nasty temper of his.  In this low budget thriller, Roddy plays a nice guy who sees his girlfriend get killed by a drunk driver, and when he strikes out at the driver, he accidentally kills him.  He is sentenced to two years in prison.  While there, he becomes a boxing/wrestling superstar, and also witnesses two guards kill another inmate.  He escapes and seeks help from his younger devil may care brother.  Meanwhile, the cops and FBI are after him, as is the vile security chief who planned the murder and wants to silence Roddy.

Typical adrenaline fare, with supporting turns by Miles O'Keefe and Alina Hamilton.

It's one of those movies that keeps your interest because you want to see justice done!
A grade B movie , but good entertainment !
Acting is par. Story line is horrible.
Phew! Low budget at it's worst.

Marked Man is a great Friday or Saturday afternoon film. Roddy is a natural. You like They Live see this film. Classic Piper!!!
I met him twice and I Miss Him.
low grade - low rent movie throughout,  barely kept my attention
Seemed a little  like it had a very small budget
Great Movie... I enjoyed it very much.
picked it because it had 3 stars - wasn't that good
I enjoyed it and it's worth viewing.
This movie kept my interest, but wasn't a great movie.
jumping cactus chili would be great with this movie.  it will keep your attention off of all the wonderful acting.
I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.  The story line was great.
Story line is OK.  It moves a little slow.  Not A rated actors.  Will miss Roddy.

When I selected the movie I did not realize it was a 1996 film, it was evident it was old-school filming.
It had an interesting plot and it was very well thought out -  however it reminded me of a very long drawnout TV series.
Low budget movie with border-line entertainment value.
B movie. Bad, Boring and tedious to watch.
The actor is not a good runner is legs are not for running
very good seen this one before
No a very good movie, couldn't take it seriously. Really was a comedy in my mind.
Predictable--and not in a good way.
Lots of action.  Story moves along.  Worth the time to view.
Roddy Piper is great in this movie.
The acting was horrible. The sound affects were put together by a fifth grader. The only good thing was the story line and even then...He did kill 3 people and assaulted a number of police officers.

Always liked Roddy Piper in his wrestling days. Plot interesting but some of the scenes a little far fetched. I mean he was wanted for murdering a copy, escaping from prison and seemed to getting around pretty easily.
Hey come on! It was Rowdy Roddy Piper!  Would you know it was worth a watch, some good action,  some good one-liners. I would  watch it again.
Prisoner new where and when to look no suspense
I liked it, not bad not great, but worth watching
Great 90's flick! Don't f@ck with Roddy Piper RIP
Very good action flick, I really enjoyed it.....Piper looks like a young Redford.
Simple movie but I enjoyed it
A good. fun, action movie highlighted by the wrestler "Roudy Roddy Piper". A good story of a bad guy gone good who is wrongly accused and has to fight for his life.
Great movie, lots of action and deception.
An exciting story with never a dull moment and likable heroes.
Too bad you can't give zero stars. Could tolerate exactly 11 minutes before I had to shut it off. Lousy script, lousy screenplay, lousy acting.
The acting and directing is good. The movie keeps the viewer interested and engaged. The story is fairly predictable but it is well-performed and presented.
Pretty good movie to watch in your spare time.
Typical 80/90s low budget file but enjoyable.

Could have been a four star movie.  The story is OK, some of the acting is OK, some of it isn't OK.  They spent some time and effort bothering to go out in the woods, it's obviously not big budget, but they spent some time on it for sure.  I think it's the editing that makes it run like a B movie.  The timing is wrong, the music is not always the best choice.  Maybe with better editing and a few retakes it could be 4 stars.  Fun movie that ends up being somewhat of an unintentional comedy as well as an action movie.
It was a interesting movie and entertaining to watch.
good but not outstanding. good fight
I enjoyed this movie a lot.  Loved the suspense.
Slow and predictable, main character moves from one poor decision to the next... stopped watching about 2/3 through.
Marked Man is a third rate movie with 2nd rate actors and a plot designed by a 12th grader.
Slow start with a great finish. If you like action movies I would recommend this one.
Great and suspenseful from beginning to end easy to follow.
Not Seen! This story isn't true!

It's one of the better "B" movies I have ever seen.  These movies give up-and-coming stars a chance to break through as well as give current stars of different genres an opportunity to provide entertainment in a different medium.  Roddy Piper is a pretty decent performer, with realism in his lines and actions.  The only thing I kept noticing that pulled me out of the story was the fact that for a buff, athletic man....he sure runs funny!
Roddy Pipers best next to "They Live". Great fight scenes, and an engaging plot as well. This movie kept you guessing all the way to the end.

Roddy Piper is excellent in this movie. Too bad this didn't get a dvd release. I had to order the tape and then get it transferred onto dvd. Anyways I would def recommend this one for any Roddy piper fan.

Roddy Piper - I almost forgot about him.
Don't recall his entire carrer but I do remember him wrestling & making enjoyable action movies.
This is another good movie on his list of work.

It's a movie from the 90's, a good Roddy Piper movie with all of the required action, acting, and drama in the era of disco and B movies. All of the negative critics don't take into account that these movies are made to entertain, not to have deep intellectual pretentions and snotty actors pretending they have class or superiority over all of mankind.
Awesome movie. Was good and had you guessing all the through. I recommend.
better than I thought, but not the best
